original_text: And this word, Yet once more, signifieth the removing of those things that are shaken, as of things that are made, that those things which cannot be shaken may remain.
korean_text: 이 또 한 번이라 하심은 진동하지 아니하는 것을 영존하게 하기 위하여 진동할 것들 곧 만드신 것들이 변동될 것을 나타내심이라

sentences.original_text: And this word, Yet once more,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 말씀, 다시 한번 더,

sentences.original_text: signifieth the removing of those things
as of things that are made,
that those things which cannot be shaken
